Text: this is not playing for me.

Hi I have a question if someone could answer.. will this type file play in my windows media player version 10 or 11? If not, what do I use to play..would like to know before I download? Help please I'm new to this! SuGar :) TIA

SuGarBriTches => Stop using windows media player, use vlc and you won't have any reading problems ever (and you can add subtitles manually) : 
http://www.videolan.org/vlc/download-windows.html
